          <title>
            <string language="sl">Poišči in pobarvaj</string>
            <string language="en">Find and color</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdeckung und Farbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvaille et couleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Achado e cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ritrovamento e colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε και χρωματίστε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hallazgo y color</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Reševalec mora pozorno opazovati in primerjati.</string>
            <string language="en">One picture in a row is different from the others - find and color it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovanje</string>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">barvanje</string>
            <string language="en">colouring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">primerjanje</string>
            <string language="en">comparison</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Abbildung in einer Reihe ist zu den anderen 
unterschiedlich - finden Sie und färben Sie sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une image dans une ligne est différente des 
autres - trouvez-et colorez-la.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um retrato em uma fileira é diferente do outro - 
encontre-a e colora-.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'immagine in una fila è differente dagli altre 
- trovila e colori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εικόνα σε μια σειρά είναι διαφορετική από άλλες 
- την βρείτε και χρωματίστε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un cuadro en una fila es diferente de los otros - 
encuéntrela y coloree.</string>
          </description>
